alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:31PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Denver and northwestern Adams Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 331 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brighton, or 18 miles northeast of Denver, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Commerce City, Brighton, northeastern Denver International Airport, Lochbuie, Barr Lake and Todd Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
